ball_detection: White ball with black pattern - NOT yellow objects
Ball must be MOVING to be in play
contact_detection: Contact = ball TOUCHES hand, not just proximity
Deflection = ball changes direction after contact
False positives often occur when ball is near but not touching
confidence_tuning: 19.90s was 83% but FALSE - threshold needs adjustment
18.20s was 71% but TRUE - real contacts may have lower initial confidence
offside_detection: Need WIDE camera view with all players visible
Identify teams by JERSEY COLOR (dark vs white/light)
Check at MOMENT OF PASS (ball trajectory visible)
Attacker must be AHEAD of offside line AND ahead of ball
Look for attacker in/near PENALTY AREA running toward goal
